example.eg: Your insurance will only cover these approved drugs.  The new house must be built in accordance with the approved plans.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 经检验的, 已核准的

example.eg: Although Isabelle's parents know that she wants to date Elmer, they do not approve.
example.egtrans: 虽然伊莎贝尔的父母知道她想和埃尔默约会，但他们并不赞成。

example.eg: Her parents did not approve of her new boyfriend.
example.egtrans: 她的父母不喜欢她的新男友。

example.eg: Leslie will never approve the idea of smoking inside restaurants.
example.egtrans: 莱斯利绝不会赞成在餐厅内吸烟的主意。

example.eg: The Senate quickly approved the bill.
example.egtrans: 参议院很快批准了立法提案。

example.eg: Although it took a long time, the committee ultimately approved Jessica's grant proposal.
example.egtrans: 尽管历时很久，但是委员会最终同意了杰西卡的拨款提案。
